advice: Please consult a doctor before taking any medicine.
Avoid screen time and consult a doctor if pain persists.
Drink warm fluids and consult a doctor if cough continues.
Take rest and consult a doctor if symptoms worsen.
Avoid spicy food and consult a doctor.
Gargle with warm salt water and consult a doctor.
Apply hot compress and consult a doctor.
Avoid allergens and consult a doctor.
